segments.text: I see the water pouring over the sink, and it’s just getting worse by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, but she’s not doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, and she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it’s about to tip—this is terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel so bad for them—they’re going to get hurt or in trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is ruining everything, and she’s just drying dishes like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just filled with so many things going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
